Reviews.Content: Good hotel - not close to Frankfurt though I had one night at the unfortunately named Bad Vilbel. I was there on business so it's location was good for me, but if you want to be close to frankfurt then this is not the hotel for you. Its about a 鈧?0 cab ride from the airport, and there isnt much of interest within walking distance. However the hotel itself is great, with big rooms, juliette balcony, large clean bathroom, wireless broadband @ 鈧? per hour (you pay T-Mobile for this, it doesnt go on your bill). It also has a wellness centre, with sauna, steam room and spa, which I used and it was very clean, although personally i prefer them a bit hotter. Front desk staff were very helpful with excellent english. Only negative was that there were trucks unloading early in the morning, so if you are a light sleeper, earplugs may be the go.
Reviews.Author: bellmeister
